title: CubeNet: Equivariance to 3D Rotation and Translation

tldr.text: A Group Convolutional Neural Network with linear equivariance to translations and right angle rotations in three dimensions is introduced, and is believed to be the first 3D rotation equivariant CNN for voxel representations.

identity : there exists a transformation e ∈ G (sometimes written 0 ) such that eg = ge = g, ∀ g ∈ G
A subgroup H is any subset of G , which satisfies the four group axioms
